wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Woodford (born 4 June 1950) is a Manx celebrity chef, actor, television presenter, businessman, hotelier and former restaurateur.

response: Anthony Worral Thompson, Ray Charles, Kevin Woodford, Lindka Cierach, Eva Herzigova, Alan Whicker, and Ian Botham.
Famous residents of the parish have included English keyboard player Rick Wakeman, best known as the keyboardist for progressive rock group Yes, and Manx-born TV chef and actor, Kevin Woodford.
